alert.note: Alert for Hood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 6:46PM CDT until July 09 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hood County in north central Texas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 646 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Granbury, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Granbury, Pecan Plantation, Oak Trail Shores and Tolar. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. If on or near Lake Granbury, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm. High winds and waves can capsize boats.
